pli-tv-bu-vb-pc19:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc19:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato channassa upaṭṭhāko mahāmatto āyasmato channassa vihāraṁ kārāpeti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc19:1.3_0: Atha kho āyasmā channo katapariyositaṁ vihāraṁ punappunaṁ chādāpeti, punappunaṁ lepāpeti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc19:1.5_0: Atha kho āyasmā channo tiṇañca kaṭṭhañca saṅkaḍḍhanto aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa yavakhettaṁ dūsesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc19:1.6_0: Atha kho so brāhmaṇo ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc19:1.8_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tassa brāhmaṇassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc19:1.9_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc19:1.10_0: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā channo katapariyositaṁ vihāraṁ punappunaṁ chādāpessati,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc19:1.11_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ channaṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc19:1.17_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc19:1.18.1_0: “Mahallakaṁ pana bhikkhunā vihāraṁ kārayamānena yāva dvārakosā aggaḷaṭṭhapanāya ālokasandhiparikammāya
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc19:1.18.1_2: Tato ce uttari appaharitepi ṭhito adhiṭṭhaheyya pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc19:2.1.4_0: ullitto vā hoti avalitto vā ullittāvalitto vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc19:2.1.12_0: vātapānaparikammāya setavaṇṇaṁ kāḷavaṇṇaṁ gerukaparikammaṁ mālākammaṁ latākammaṁ makaradantakaṁ pañcapaṭikaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc19:2.1.15_0: Sace harite ṭhito adhiṭṭhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc19:2.1.16_0: Maggena chādentassa dve magge adhiṭṭhahitvā tatiyaṁ maggaṁ āṇāpetvā pakkamitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc19:2.1.17_0: Pariyāyena chādentassa dve pariyāye adhiṭṭhahitvā tatiyaṁ pariyāyaṁ āṇāpetvā pakkamitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc19:2.1.18_0: Tato ce uttari appaharitepi ṭhito adhiṭṭhaheyyāti
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc19:2.1.20_0: Silāya chādentassa silāya silāya āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc19:2.1.21_0: Sudhāya chādentassa piṇḍe piṇḍe āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc19:2.1.22_0: Tiṇena chādentassa karaḷe karaḷe āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc19:2.1.23_0: Paṇṇena chādentassa paṇṇe paṇṇe āpatti pācittiyassa.
